DOC.HEADLINE: RAIN FORCES POSTPONEMENT OF SEVERAL GAMES
DOC.TEXT: Thursday ' s rain forced the postponement of a number of high_school and community_college events . On the high_school level , the Southern Section Division II boys ' soccer playoff_game between Capistrano Valley and Santa Ana Valley was moved to 3 p.m. today at Santa Ana Stadium . The Southern Section Division I wild-card girls ' soccer game between Dana Hills and Newport Harbor was rescheduled for 3:15 p.m. today at Newport Harbor . On the community_college level , Orange Coast ' s first-round baseball_game against San Mateo in the Hancock tournament will be played_at 2 p.m. today . The OCC men ' s tennis match at Southwestern has been rescheduled for March 1 . And OCC ' s softball_game against San Bernardino was postponed with no new date set . The Golden West men ' s tennis match against San Diego Mesa will be made_up at 2 p.m. today and its track_meet was rescheduled to April 1 .
